Entries.default: "Now where did I put my flint and steel?"
"Do these people normally leave this much black powder lying about?"
"Anybody mind if I smoke? I'll- I'll be careful."
"Di verus, are the Rauataians here to colonize the Deadfire or blow it all to pieces?"
"You lot hold course. I'll be staying back here, not getting myself blown thrice to shit and shit again."
"Is it me, or is that an awful lot of black powder?"
